attacks.name: Impale
attacks.special: May only be used if a Charge was made in this Activation.

attacks.name: Trample
attacks.special: If a Critical Hit is made, the target Character is Prone, and this Character may move out of combat without any penalties.

traits.name: Thorned
traits.description: At the end of each Round, any non-Elven Character in base contact with the Briarbeast takes a Hit.

traits.name: Thirst of the Forest
traits.description: If a Briarbeast Knocks Out a Character, they regain D3 HP.
